output.conclusion: By completing this course, you've gained a foundational understanding of Decentralized Science (DeSci) and its potential to revolutionize scientific research and collaboration. You are now equipped to explore DeSci projects, contribute to decentralized scientific communities, and advocate for a more open and accessible future for science.
output.introduction: Welcome to the Decentralized Science (DeSci) course for beginners! This course will introduce you to the core concepts of DeSci, exploring how blockchain technology and decentralized principles can transform scientific research, funding, and collaboration. No prior knowledge of blockchain or science is required.
